title: How close are we to a real Iron Man suit that is not privately owned? - Quora

response.answer_text: A million light years or so… Because Iron Man can’t actually work according to the laws of physics as we know them. By that I mean a suit that can fly at the same speeds as Iron Man, take the same kind of punishment and has the same kind of offensive power. It is in theory possible to make some sort of jetpack like suit… But that’s not even remotely the same thing.
